message.body: On the train PRAISE THE LORD

Hurray! Good one ######. I know tha was stressful. It happens to everyone at some point. Ha ha Love you. Please call me when you to 30th street station so I know what train you'll be taking to swat. Love
Super see u at the station
I got in to McGill website and booked the only tour for Monday which is at 10:30 am. Please forward to me the email they sent u with the details. Thanks. Love.
Can you pick me up from school?
Forget about everyone else. Focus on what you want to learn.
What was the funny commercial u were telling me about?
Oh maybe it was Shen or Kofi telling me about it. Sorry
OMG IM WORRIED I MAY HAVE MISSED THE DEADLINE TO ACCEPT AN OFFER FROM MCGILL CAN YOU CALL THEM IM FREAKING OUT
U probably still have time they said the deadline is stated in your acceptance letter in Minerva. I will try to check that for you now
And I just sent them an email from your account asking when the financial aid info will be sent. Hopefully you will hear from them soon about that.
